courses.name: Functional communications for work
courses.description: This course considers key communication areas in depth to help you become more confident in the workplace as well as more effective.

courses.name: Improve your communication skills
courses.description: This communication skills training will not only teach you about communicating and overcoming barriers, but also how to ask questions, to listen and even the importance of body language.

courses.name: Effective communications
courses.description: This will help you present clear, positive messages in the workplace. Both appropriate for corporate communication training as well for use in personal situations.
